website_summaries.verdict: Larger families and fashionistas alike will appreciate this extra-large, double-sided clothing rack.
pros: Double racks allow for supreme  clothing storage
4 side bars  included for garment accessories
Rack positioned on 4 wheels for simple transporting
cons: A few customers found that the wheels were low-quality compared to the rest of the product

customer_reviews.title: It's really a one bar rack
customer_reviews.text: Product is pretty sturdy when moving on a laminate floor. What I really don't like is that you cannot fully hang two sets of adult cloths as the bars are too close together. So you really only have one bar for adult cloths to use. The picture I feel misrepresents the product. The picture should show how much overlapping there is between the two bars with cloths on it. See picture in this review.
customer_reviews.author: Rupe

customer_reviews.title: I have to up date my negative review
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this item. I bought it based on reviews but the metal is bent in the rail opening in part A so the next piece cannot fit. One side fits but the other side is almost an oval shape. A picture is worth a 1000 words. It will be a hardship for me to repackage and return. UPDATE: the vendor responded to my review immediately and shipped out a replacement without me even requesting it. Unfortunately I have been out of town and UPS wouldn't leave it. Hopefully I can connect with them for re delivery. I was very impressed with the customer service of this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Emmie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. We bought this rack a few months ago and have only used it for a couple months and it is not the quality we were lead to believe. We don't move this rack often and one of the wheels snapped off when I rolled it just a few inches over! It is useless and if we can we will be sending it back for a refund!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and durable product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy assembly - I bought 2 and it took ten minutes total. In the middle of hanging all my clothes up and I had to stop to leave a review. The racks seems to be sturdy and durable, and I like to 2 in 1 with different heights as well as the arms extending out even more. Will definitely purchase again if I neee more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This is unbelievably sturdy. Have placed it in the basement to hold our motorcycle gear over the winter months (very heavy leather jackets/chaps/denim jackets and use over the summer months for winter coats. Recently down-sized to a condo and closet space is at a premium. I have overloaded this item and so far, it work great!
customer_reviews.author: wischick

customer_reviews.title: Rack Did Not Hold Up to it's end.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote that I loved this rack until the front bar broke off and my clothes and front top bar of the rack came down. My cats love sleeping under it and could have KILLED them. I didn't have any heavy clothes on it only some summer shirts and it's suppose to hold up to 250 lbs. I have looked and look on to get a replacement part but could not find how to do this. HELP.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: IF I was to have any criticism for this rack it would be a wish for the second bar to have an extra couple inches between it and the other bar. However I understand physics and it likely would make it more likely to tip so overall I'm very happy. Really sturdy, commercial wheels, a cinch to put together and a fair price. Love the extensions on all 4 bars. I read idk how many reviews before I decided on this rack and I definitely made the right decision.
customer_reviews.author: wawamama

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in enough time to use if for a garage sale to hang up clothes. Unfortunately, some parts were rusted and a couple of the end caps were damaged. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: I. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE this rack! I had one of the cheap, collapsible plastic racks before, and everytime I removed a hanger, the arm would fall and drop ALL of my clothes. It was so frustrating to rehang everything again. Finally caved and purchased this. It's wide enough to use both sides at once and is very sturdy. Assembly took less than 5 minutes. The rollers work very well and it's easy to tote around. Only con is that it is obviously very large and not quickly broken down, so storage could be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Very well built at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Very well built at this price point. As some have mentioned, due to the depth of the two rods, this rack works better with more narrow items on one rack and wider on the other. We put pants on one and shirts on the other. Also breaks down easily if you ever need to store it.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT Industrial Strength!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a uniform Mom for my sons high school band and purchased this rack to hand and transport some uniforms on. I am disappointed, I hung 30 uniforms weighing about 4lbs each and the rack bent and collapsed. There is no way this is a “Supreme Industrial Rack that holds 250lbs” If I Still had the box I would be shipping this junk back.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Straight up GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give negative stars. I got this garment rack yesterday and started to put it together today and some of the spring loaded buttons broke and fell inside of the bars which made this useless since the pieces can't be snapped together. The worst part is that not all of the parts are aligned so it doesn't even fit properly. Now I have to repackage and send back less than 24 hours after I received it.
customer_reviews.author: meoslws

customer_reviews.title: Everyone had such great reviews, sadly I missed the return window by ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone had such great reviews, sadly I missed the return window by a few days. I went to put this together and it was like someone in the warehouse squished the connection ends. The round bar for one side will not even close to fit in the hole. It just balances on top. This was a complete waste of money for me. This goes to show you, if you buy an item that needs assembly, put it together when you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: MisoSari

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO STEER - FALLS EASILY WHEN LOADED
customer_reviews.text: After assembling, I found that it was impossible to push this thing because the wheels do not rotate to turn the unit. WD40 was no help! It has fallen while loaded leaving 2 piles of clothes on the ground. If you plan to try to use this to move clothes, CHOOSE ANOTHER PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: because it was not sturdy. I purchased this item for her and just ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife does craft shows and she displays her items on racks and tables. At one craft show she attended, the rack she was using kept falling down, due to wind, but more so, because it was not sturdy. I purchased this item for her and just by opening the box the rack arrived in, I could see that it was well made and stable. She attended a show last weekend and used the rack I purchased for her and she was very pleased with it. And, like the old saying goes, when Mamas happy, everyone's happy.
customer_reviews.author: mark w. gross

customer_reviews.title: Love this Double Rail Portable Closet.
customer_reviews.text: This double rail clothing rack is all that it is stated to be. I love this Rack. Sturdy and holds a lot of weight. Assembles quickly. Really a life saver for hanging laundry to Dry esp in the Winter Time, instead of Hanging in the outside Cold. Portable.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient garment rack
customer_reviews.text: It’s like having two racks within the space of one. Very strong, durable and easy to assemble. I custom cut a piece of heavy duty cardboard to lay across bottom of rack and stacked shoe boxes! I purchased two racks and have asked a lot of them, but they are holding all the clothes with ease. They are packed and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: So many books, so little time

customer_reviews.title: second time buying this
customer_reviews.text: So, I did buy this same exact item in Feb of 2018 originally, and I loved it, so I came back to buy another one, and I was so surprised, because it was not the exact same as the original. It did have dual bars, but instead of having one straight, and one bent, it had two bent bars...actually I really like it a lot, it is so practical. It is super easy and fast to put together, and really holds a lot of clothes. One word of advice, evenly distribute the weight on this, otherwise, it might fall over. Great value, and I can not believe how fast I received it! I will be back to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Terbear

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Plenty of Room
customer_reviews.text: The company must have improved on this item as I read many reviews stating you could not hang adult size clothing on both racks as they would cram together. In those photos it appears there was a straight bar and a curved bar from those posts, however both my bars were curved. Since they both curve out (like the product photo) there is plenty of room to hang on both sides without cramming it all together. There is plenty of space between the two sets of clothes. Snaps together in about 5 minutes without any tools and seems to be sturdy. I really like the system and may order a second one if space permits.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great professional looking rack
customer_reviews.text: I needed to make space in my closet for my daughter's clothes. She's staying with me for a few months and I want her to have my room. I was pleasantly surprised at how nice this clothes rack is. I was able to fit a lot of clothes on it. Both sides are far enough apart for the clothes to not get in the way of the opposite side. It's well-made and easy to assemble. I didn't need any tools except for the wrench that was supplied for the wheels. And I hardly needed the instructions. I highly recommend this garment rack.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDeuces

customer_reviews.title: Works well just protect your walls...
customer_reviews.text: We recently completed a renovation project and moved the Laundry Room to the second floor of our home. I needed an additional rack to hang dry clothes before putting them away. This particular rack certainly works. My only complaint is the round disks on the ends of the extension rods are rough and I have already chipped the new paint job in the room. I have scoured the local hardware stores for something I could put over the ends and furniture caps would not work. The extensions are not removable so I could not dip them in a silicon product. I ended up placing balloons (see picture) over the ends just to protect the walls and doors.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Czarnecki

customer_reviews.title: Not great for heavy items
customer_reviews.text: This is not great for heavy items. Within 15 minutes of putting my coats and long sleeve shirts evenly on the rack, this completely fell over. I think the base is too small for the long arms. I ended up having to put heavy plastic bins on the bottom to hold it down. Dangerous and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kealafly

customer_reviews.title: Survived Drama Club use!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase! I highly recommend and would definitely buy again. I purchased this product to roll our Drama Club costumes back and forth across campus from my Kindergarten classroom. It has survived 5-year-olds standing on the bottom bars and being rolled by students over door sills and across concrete to get to and from the MPR, in addition to students taking costumes on off either side. It has never fallen over and I have the top bars fully extended. With those out and utilizing the bottom bars to hold a couple of boxes, it holds the costumes for my entire cast of 40 students. I am pleasantly surprised and so glad I chose this item.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Fine Rack; Inadequate Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Rack is fine, but the instructions did not specify how to turn the sides of the bottom rack (parts A & B) 90 degrees so that the top rack could fit. The sides kept turning inwards. My mom had to stand on the bottom of the racks while I pushed in the buttons at the bottom for her to adjust the side to 90 degrees. This will make sense once you start assembling. As another reviewer said, something that should've taken 5 minutes took an hour. -_- Tip: put wheels on last despite what the instructions says (step 2).
customer_reviews.author: I & J Black

customer_reviews.title: It Appears I got Good Value for my Money
customer_reviews.text: I've seen worse instructions. Even though no parts are labeled A, B, C etc the pictures w=represent each part accurately. I did the assembly in about 12 minutes with one error to correct but that was because I did not look at the illustrations. The wheels are wide and sturdy and unloaded the cart feels light. Loaded with clothes on both sides, it remained stable but it did feel a little top-heavy. This is not for commercial use. Great for personal storage, and how often does someone need to roll the rack through the house? I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: therack

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product for the price. We use it to hang winter coats off season in the basement and are happy with the capacity of the rack and its' durability. We've owned cheaper racks like this on wheels that were made of a combination of plastic and metal. Those were not durable enough to load up with the weight of our winter coats and started to fail after one season. The metal edges of some of the parts on this rack are sharp enough to scrape you if not careful. I took care of that by putting some blue painter's tape over these sharp areas. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: mr_precision

customer_reviews.title: It’ll do 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous because the box was so small. I didn’t think it would fit all the clothes I needed it to hold. SURPRISE! It fit everything with room left for more. BAD NEWS :: You had 1 job! The person who drills holes completely botched the job on the middle pieces. Lucky all the other holes are in the correct place & it can still be put together & functional. I do wish the wheels had locks but I suppose my clothes won’t make a run for it now that they have wheels. This rack isn’t heavy to be called “heavy duty”. It’s a basic laundry room rack. For the price not bad just not AWESOMENESS 🙂
customer_reviews.author: MzIzJay

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Great! Pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a cheapo one that finally imploded. But before it imploded I had tied it to the nearby curtain rod because it was leaning precariously to one side, getting ready to implode under the weight of tons of scrub uniforms. This arrived promptly, put it together easy enough. This is leaps & bounds better than the old one & holds my tons of scrubs with room to spare. Very sturdy, rolls effortlessly, it cost twice as much as old cheapo but there is no comparison. This one is worth the extra money. I’m thinking I won’t have to buy another one, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kau Lehua

customer_reviews.title: Holds a ton of heavy clothes and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Living in a 1928 home without closets and using wardrobes which are full. This was my solution and It is absolutely awesome and sturdy. It is holding a lot of weight and has not tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More compact and wide than I thought it would be - but very functional!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Fits easily together. It's smaller (length wise) than I expected but the double bars hold a greater capacity. Also the bars are at equal height, not high-low as pictured. The wheels do not roll freely but I don't really need them to, adequate for transiting over small spaces. Overall, seems much sturdier than the single-bar clothes rack I replaced and definitely holds more clothes. The hangers do not touch in the center - I've got more than 30 men's dress jackets side-by-side on it with no overlap. Nice. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Megginson

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: I had my clothes rack or bar used to hang my clothes on in my home closet collapse. I knew it would not be an easy fix and would involve some home renovations. While waiting to do the renovations, I purchased this rack and it was a life saver. I have an embarrassing number of clothes and never thought that this rack would hold up but it did. I was able to hang my many articles of clothing and the rack accommodated all of it. It's sturdy and fits nicely in my closet. Now I can take my time with my renovating plans.
customer_reviews.author: newbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack in preparation for a yard sale. I already had one movable rack that a friend had lent me, but needed another one. This rack is SO MUCH sturdier than the one lent to me by the friend. I was constantly having to worry about the other rack tipping over, but that is NOT an issue with this rack at all. My boyfriend and I put the rack together probably within 10 minutes. They even include a little wrench for tightening bolts, and an extra bolt, etc, in case they are needed. Just gotta say I am completely satisfied with this produce.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Wagner

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Sturdy and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve searched high and low for the clothing rack I want. THIS one is as close to my requirements as any other I’ve seen! Granted...Even at a discounted rate of $50, I thought it was too pricy. But this rack is worth it! I’ve had cheap, aluminum X-designed racks—which cannot support my clothes. In fact, those were a liability, to me. However, THIS rack is a dream-come-true! It’s everything I wanted and needed! THIS rack is sturdy (up to 210 lbs of clothes) and stabile! It won’t collapse and fold over, like those cheap designs. I LOVE this rack! Thank you for designing such a great product...and so easy to assemble! I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Pelipen

customer_reviews.title: I got this to replace a plastic stand
customer_reviews.text: The plastic stand eventually broke after a year of being in my attic which gets up to 120+ degrees. The heat seemed to weaken the plastic but this steel rack will stand up well to the high temps. It was easy to put together, and I did it in my hot attic because I was NOT going to try to maneuver it up my narrow staircase. So even in an uncomfortable situation, I assembled the rack in less than 30 minutes and I am very happy with my purchase. If something changes, I will come back and edit my comment.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity but not intended to be fully utilized
customer_reviews.text: The capacity of this rack is great. We are renovating and need to temporarily hang clothes from 2 closets in another room. Our hope was to be able to take advantage of the two bars to maximize space. However when fully loaded, even evenly on both sides, the upright bars buckled and the rack became not sturdy. Would probably be fine of all the clothes were lightweight shirts and dresses, but it could not handle men's suits, sweaters, pants, etc.
customer_reviews.author: pceSC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, super sturdy, easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised, but I love this clothing rack. The only issue I had was, one of the pegs at the bottom was missing, but I was easily able to secure it with a screw. Problem solved. 100% will purchase another when needed. Super sturdy, both sides fill with ease and no worries that it will tip or buckle. Very easy to assemble. It maybe took me 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: A little bit of skeptic.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit of a skeptic. Since I've replace several other garment rack brands. And I honestly didn't want to pay the money for this brands rack to break on me. Arrived before two days early and it only took roughly less than 20 mins to put it together. However, I did have a problem with one of the attachments not fitting into the other attachment. Yet, I'm a bit of a savvy lady I was able to make an oval into a circle. Just don't ask how I done it. Yes, I'd given 5 star it was for this rack withstands all of my workout clothes, sweaters, jackets, etc without breaking down nor have yet to topple over.
customer_reviews.author: Msyjtaylor

customer_reviews.title: More Better than Worst
customer_reviews.text: I totally support this rack for materials, capacity, value, and design. Easy to assemble (and super easy if you have two people). The all metal design is welcomed after my previous plastic rack snapped due to the heavy weight of clothes. The double side holds a lot of clothes, however be aware of the dimensions as it will take up more space than a single horizontal pole design (reminder that hanging clothes sick out beyond the dimensions of the rack). The manufacturer should consider an enhanced design that will allow a mesh flat top for laying things such a wet sweater for drying, etc. Overall, I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Love

customer_reviews.title: WIder than you might realize
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this rack and it seems very sturdy and well-built. I just wanted to point out that once you hang shirts on both racks, it will fit comfortably without overlapping. However, with clothes hanging on both racks, the width increases to 37.5 inches not just the 20.5 inches as stated in the description. This is for those that are planning to squeeze the rack somewhere tight maybe in their closet or in a bedroom and doesn't realize the width will increase.
customer_reviews.author: Boom Shaka Laka

customer_reviews.title: No Closet? No Problem.
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a house with very small closets, I bought this to store most all of my clothes and so far so good. I hang my scarfs off the ends (which are extendable). Tall enough for longer dresses and it feels very sturdy, even packed with clothes. Best part is I am able to store pants/shorts/skirts in smaller wooden crates I purchased at a local home improvement store on the cross beams on the bottom. Looks great and is a totally functional bit of extra storage space.
customer_reviews.author: MPete

customer_reviews.title: Quality  rack.
customer_reviews.text: Love this however it is larger than expected due to two racks but I solved that problem by only using one most of the time. My den where I have the rack is tiny so using the one rack is perfect and then I only use the second rack for temporary reasons. Great quality and easy to roll. Any chance of a peice to put on top for storage that wouldn’t touch the hangars? It’s sturdy and low enough for something.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy rack!
customer_reviews.text: This rack is wonderful. It is smaller than I expected, but it fits so much on it. I have at least 80 plus hanging items on this rack and can fit more if I needed to. It is very sturdy. I thought my clothes would overlap with it being a double rack, but they do not. It's easy to roll the wheels too. It was so easy to put together. It only took me about 10 minutes to assemble. This is a very great bargain and a very nice rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I love this clothes rack. Easy to assemble. Instructions are minimum, but after seeing the picture, you have to figure it out yourself. Looks great. Only tool you need is a wrench and they have provided one for you. Arrived undamaged. Took about 30 minutes to assemble as I was watching TV while I did this. Not to challenging for a senior citizen. Well built, sturdy. It is replacing one that I bought locally several years ago. No comparison as this one is built far better. Spend a little more, but have a 1000% better product.
customer_reviews.author: KimD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first double rail clothes rack and reordered because the poles didn't fit on one side (also the buttons did lock on one side). It seemed as if someone had already tried to assemble it. This one could be assembled--only one button did not lock but is not critical. It holds a lot of clothing which is why I purchased it. The extensions seem a little fragile and I only wish the bars were further apart to reduce crowding and more clothing would fit. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Ample storage, sturdy hanging garment rack on wheels
customer_reviews.text: We have a walk-in closet in our guest bedroom and needed a quick option for hanging clothes that was also mobile and sturdy. An earlier unit had fallen apart due to poor construction. This unit was quick and easy to assemble, is sturdy and maneuverable. Note that although a curve in the vertical pipes keeps the two rows of garments apart, it does take up more space (almost a foot more). But it does provide space for a lot of garments especially with the extensions at the end of each bar.
customer_reviews.author: Falgun Jariwala

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT really “Heavy Duty” by any stretch of the imagination.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it was not stronger. A few years ago, I purchased 2 others of a different brand that are really heavy duty. I couldn't remember where I bought them. Hoped and assumed, because it says heavy duty in the title, that this would be stronger. It isn't! That being said, if you don't need it to be all that strong, it would probably work fine. They should change the title to say light or medium duty.
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Garment Rack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rack to use for a garage sale, and it worked out very well. It was so easy to put together, and it was easy to take apart to transport it back home. No tools needed. I was able to put quite a bit of clothes on both sides and had no problems with it holding them all. I left the wheels off so it wouldn't roll around on the driveway, so it was a little shorter than I anticipated. I am definitely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I just ordered another one!
customer_reviews.text: I am turning my smaller bedroom into a walk in closet without using built-ins. This double clothing rack was very easy to assemble. It seems very sturdy and easy to roll. I just ordered another one. I especially like there are 2 racks at eye level instead of one on top of another. Very easy to find what you are looking for on the side-by-side racks with enough clearance between the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Pat

customer_reviews.title: Simple Houseware Heavy Duty Double Rail Clothing Garment Rack a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This clothing rack is very nice and has worked great for us. We use it to hang clothes directly from the drier in our garage, let them finish drying there. It has plenty of room for clothes on hangers as well as sweaters and socks you don't want to over-dry. The rack is well constructed, extremely easy to install, and very sturdy. It has a nice chrome finish. There were no rusted areas, bad welds, or faulty rollers, as indicated in some reviews. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Grande

customer_reviews.title: Extremely stable. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly strong, easy to put together. The industrial wheels will allow me to bring this in and out of the house and onto the deck to air dry clothes. It will also be very helpful moving seasonal clothing from one end of the house to the other. When I redo my master closet, I will consider using these instead of other installation of rods. Then to switch seasonally wardrobes will be as easy as turning the double rod, strong units around in the closet. Only thing you'll need to put it together is a pair of scissors to open plastic bags and cut plastic ties.
customer_reviews.author: P. Breneman

customer_reviews.title: Holds ALL my motorcycle clothing
customer_reviews.text: I have dozens of leather jackets, vest, fabric jackets, chaps, Harley shirts, hoodies, and levi vests. Also movie replica jackets. Loaded a good 400 lbs. of stuff on it, put some boards across the bottom and stored 8 pairs of MC boots. Rolls around easily making access excellent. Now I can see everything there is. In cleaning out the closets found leathers purchased in the 70's and 80's I had forgotten about. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to replace other lower-quality (with plastic connectors) that had repeatedly broken or collapsed. While it is difficult to attest to the durability as we just got them, it appears they are far sturdier than the ones with plastic joints and thinner rods. Set-up is easy and, so far, they are holding far more weight than our previous ones with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Total Garbage - don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is total garbage. It was sent to me in already taped up box, meaning that it was recycled from another customer how returned it. All parts were welded crooked, not true at 90 degrees, so there was no way to put it together straight. Absolute lack of quality control at the factory. I had to return it as it wasn't usable. The seller obviously doesn't care about their ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Good for Certain Use-Has Limitations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang clothes on to air dry in my garage next to my washer and dryer. For that purpose it’s really nice. The set up was easy and did not require any tools. That being said it’s not the most sturdy item. I would not feel comfortable hanging lots of clothing on it (such as using the extending parts) I think eventually it could break. So it depends on how much clothes you plan to put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: So far~so good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve lost a lot of weight in the past 18+ months & needed an entire new wardrobe. We put this up in our daughter’s old bedroom with all my new clothing. I needed somewhere to hang them neatly while I go through my old larger sized clothes for donation, consignment, etc. We will use it in the basement for parkas, ski jackets & pants once I’ve purged my old wardrobe. Some posters commented on difficulties assembling & buckling. We haven’t seen anything like that so far.
customer_reviews.author: RestlessHeartTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Well made. It solved my closet problem.
customer_reviews.text: This clothes rack was easy to assemble. Once it was together it rolls easily on the large casters. I have hung a lot of clothes on it and it will still roll, but you have to be careful on thick carpet, it is better to pull than push to move it. I think it was worth the money. My daughter-in-law has a cheaper rack and she said to get this one instead as she thinks hers is too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: denmother

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was actually really hard to put together. The base of the rack the part that sticks up where you put the extender bard that make it taller were close to impossible to get opened up to assemble the rest of the rack. There’s not much balance to it. I hang 3 jackets on one side but before I can get to the other side to distribute the weight it has already done fallen over. Pretty bummed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: david shaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, did it in less than 10 min. by myself. Very sturdy, holds a bunch of clothes. I mean that. Love it! My only issue is that the tiered bars are too close together, so that the clothes have no space between them, but this is a minor inconvenience and probably necessary to keep the rack from tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, this two rod garment rack holds a lot of clothes. Very sturdy. Wheels don't turn great on my hardwood floor. Not sure if they would be better on carpet. My rack came with the two rods that curved away from each other (not one curved and one straight like some others have written).
customer_reviews.author: pamdemonium

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy rack
customer_reviews.text: I've had many of these over the years primarily due to travelling to shows. I was pleasantly surprised just how heavy this was no fear of flipping over if you use both rods... totally recommend. And no, I did not receive this product for free for a return positive review. I realize they say their review is neutral even tho' the product was free but.... really, just sayin'. I wish they would stop that altogether!
customer_reviews.author: Compatria

customer_reviews.title: Remodeling lifesavers!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in several pieces but they all snap into place easily. We're remodeling and had to empty our closets. I bought two of these racks and they were lifesavers. All our clothes fit with room to spare. Even fully loaded they wheel around smoothly. Love them. I plan on using them for clothes drying after the remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gilardoni

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Item
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time and the instruction made it easy to assembly. As I was assembling the rack, I found that it is not very sturdy and wiggles. Also while assembling, there was a missing connected to the D part of the assembling connector. Therefore I returned the item because of two things defected item and weak stance.
customer_reviews.author: Boobaby

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!
customer_reviews.text: We are super happy with this purchase and we highly recommend it. It was easy enough to assemble, and it is easily supporting tons of clothes. We have it totally full, and the rack is not showing any signs of weakness. Buy this one with confidence. I would not hesitate to buy another one if I needed additional storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie W.

customer_reviews.title: This is lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I had a rolling rack similar to this that I wanted to replace. This is by no means the same quality. This is a light weight product. I actually thought I might break it during assembly. I have decided to keep it for light weight jackets and clothes but I will have to be careful not to put to many garments on this because I could see it buckling easily. I also very gently move it from one spot to another. The sway of the bars make me worried.
customer_reviews.author: Shatika James

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this garment rack for storing my "off season" blouses and tops. I should probably downsize my closet, but would rather keep it all and rotate spring/summer and fall/winter. I have had abysmal luck with purchasing this type of product, until this one... and this one is far and away the most sturdy and functional one I have purchased. I am getting ready to order a second one for my Dad, as we transition his living situation to the ground floor of his home due to him not being able to do stairs any more.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: i ordered two for a church project and the other was delivered intact and fine on another day
customer_reviews.text: the outside packaging is too flimsy for the weight of it's contents. one end of one of the retractable bars was damaged (BADLY BENT) and can't be corrected. limits it's use. was quite disapponted. i ordered two for a church project and the other was delivered intact and fine on another day. . disappointed in the damaged part but a stronger outside packaging could have prevented this, i think.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk, returning
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy duty. Surface rust on some tubes. Some rusted areas appeared to have food or other junk on them. Crappy welds, some had very sharp edges which would ruin cloths and hands. Some tubes were barley chrome plated and would certainly rust in little time. Some tubes were scratched and lightly dented. Who would let expensive clothing anywhere near this thing? The quality control is a joke. The importer is being made a fool of by the manufacturer. Was going to be a gift but I'd loose a friend in doing so. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: JRreview

customer_reviews.title: This holds a whole bunch of clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Super handy clothing rack that holds a LOT of clothes! It was easy to put together and I like that the ends pull out for even a bit more hanging room! I will say that the bottom is just a teensy bit narrower than I would have liked. If you turn this around too fast it can tip over depending on how evenly the clothing weight is distributed. LOL! Ask me how I know! All in all, for the price this item is an awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnie Hake

customer_reviews.title: Non lock wheels / ups
customer_reviews.text: Even though the box says it's fragile UPS does not care and so there was some box damage and there was a scratch or two on the bar as to the product itself it's okay it'll work for what we needed to do but the downside is the wheels do not lock would like to have locked wheels so it will not move in the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: A. Culver

customer_reviews.title: Cheap broken hardware no spare parts
customer_reviews.text: This is load. Right out of the box one of the 4 bolts Neccessary to the operation of the rack has NO THREAD. super cheap hardware and it came with no spare parts. Terrible. CHEAP DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: G Dubz

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our school's drama club to hold all the costumes. Even fully loaded, it held up fine and did the job we needed it to do. I like that it has double braced legs, as the first rack I bought did not and collapsed under the weight.
customer_reviews.author: W. Doran

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and thought this would be fine. It is not heavy duty and it’s made very poorly. I guess it depends on your standards whether or not you think it’s worth $55. It had scratches on it and after putting 20 children’s item on the one side it nearly tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: APRIL

customer_reviews.title: Lies lies lies!
customer_reviews.text: This is not heavy duty this is not professional-grade there is no way this would hold 250 lb it is cheaply made, definitely false advertising I'm going to return it ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: MzLady

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: High quality, sturdy (our clothes actually bent the upright on a different brand after several hours), attractive. Fairly easy to put together; the hardest part was taking the items out of the box. Easy to wheel around, even loaded. I will definitely look for the Simple Houseware brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very Good (after a tweak)
customer_reviews.text: The order was filled promptly, packed well, came on time and matches the description. 90% of it was easy to set up. We had one issue--one of the top pieces wouldn't fit into the side leg (the other slipped in perfectly). We used a set of pliers to open the bottom tube enough for the top one to fit in. It isn't noticeable,and there are no frayed or loose parts. Just didn't quite fit. But--it is heavy duty, we have plenty of clothes on it already and it is doing what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Iovino

customer_reviews.title: Easily assembled, very sturdy, perfect for a lot of clothes
customer_reviews.text: This rolling clothes rack is easily assembled, and you feel like you are a professional working in the garment district when you push this rack around. It's perfect! Just be careful to balance the weight on both rails, if you put too many clothes on one side it becomes top heavy and will tilt over. Properly balanced, the rack will stay upright easily.
customer_reviews.author: Vito DiPaola

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I sell old clothes on ebay each summer. I've bought a few racks cheap at places like Target, Wal Mart, but they always seemed to collapse and fall over. This one is very sturdy and strong. Held a lot of clothes and didn't fall over unless I only filled one side. So keep things even and you'll have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Idolfan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough so far.
customer_reviews.text: We didn't install the wheels. My wife is short and doesn't expect to move it. Assembly was very simple, and the construction places tension on the various components. We will see how well it holds up, but I already expect it to outlast the one it replaces. I didn't see any rust or malformed parts.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Raffensperger

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is not only made cheap, it collapsed to one side on me during an event. IT WILL NOT hold 300 lbs. IT WILL NOT BE STABLE it rocks back and forth. DEFINITELY NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!! It's crap!
customer_reviews.author: tracy dobson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.  Great price
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 ikea racks that couldn't take the weight of heavy winter coats. This rack is holding everything those 2 racks were struggling to hold and has room for more. Nice and sturdy, wheels roll great. Very easy to assemble, I think in about 10 minutes. Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: J. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty, not even close.
customer_reviews.text: This is made from very cheap thin tubing with horrible welds. The crappy wrench included is not even the correct size to tighten the casters. Use your own tools. This is very flimsy and I am very disappointed by the description. This feels like it is going to break just moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good product, meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Our home was destroyed by Hurricane Michael and we have moved to a much smaller place while we rebuild. Needed to store some of our clothes and wanted to be able to get to them easily and pick out what we needed as the seasons change. This rack allows us to do that. It is sturdy, was easily assembled and can be disassembled for easy transport and storage. It meets our needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy clothes rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack was solidly built and easy to roll. We used it to roll a lot of Halloween costumes up from a storage area to the main room in our retirement community. Because the rack has two horizontal rods that splay out, it can hold a great deal of clothes on hangers and not feel bunched up. I ordered another cheaper rack and in comparison it was awful. This is an excellent product. I have to say, I did have our engineer put it together so can't say how difficult or easy that is.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried after I ordered this product and reading some of the reviews, but I am pleasantly surprised. As you an see from my picture, it fits adult shirts side by side with no issues. Not sure if there was a design change, but this is exactly what I was looking for. Assembly took 10 minutes or less and was easily accomplished alone. Very sturdy construction and very maneuverable (without clothes). So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a solid rack
customer_reviews.text: I have had this rack for 3 months and the wheel just bucked when I tried to roll it. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed to have a rack in my basement to hang extra clothes to dry that come out of the washer. I've never been impressed with the flimsy wooden foldable racks and on top of that they don't hold much. This hanging rack can hold all my husbands shirts and doubles as an extra place to hold off season clothing as well, It's easy to assemble, easy to roll around and quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gaufres

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the garment rack because it’s so sturdy as compared to the other ones made of plastic and metal which keep falling down because they lack the durability and snap in pins like these Simple Houseware racks. Also love that it has double racks to hold more garments.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Cook

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit as a temporary rack while transitioning from my main home to an in-law apartment. I needed its service for a month, fully anticipating not using it after my move. Instead, its moving to my attic to store off-season clothes, but not before I use it for guests this Thanksgiving. It's reasonably priced, very sturdy (when they state 'heavy duty, they mean it!), versatile, holds more than I expected and really easy to assemble. I love the 4 side pull-outs, which I use for my clothes for the day or to hang my bathrobe. This clothes rack was the best surprise!
customer_reviews.author: NWHills

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Holds a lot of clothes!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this purchase. The item was exactly as described. It shipped quickly and was very easy to assemble. I could not believe how many clothes this rack holds, up to 200 lbs. I love the dual racks for sorting clothes plus it holds way more than the single pole rack. The rack slides along on carpet nice and is very sturdy for the weight fully loaded. I would definitely recommend this rack for the price! I am going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Debster

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT RACK!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! Not sure how I ever lived without it. Now, I can see all my clothes and it is very strong and sturdy, I have allready filled up both rods, one with very heavy winter coats and jackets and the other with regular clothes, and lots of them, the unit handles all of this very well. The extendable rods allow for expansion as needed, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Take your time assembling
customer_reviews.text: NOT EASY TO ASSEMBLE. If you make a mistake (putting a wrong piece in another) you won't be able to get it out. Had to take to a carpenter with a special tool so my husband didn't bash it with a hammer. Lol Once put together it is sturdy and rolls easily on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Heiny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, seems sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this garment rack for an event space. It was easy to assemble, lightweight enough to pick up and carry downstairs, the wheels roll fine, and it held over 70 coats and jackets. The ends of the top bars extend about a foot on each end, providing even more space. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: mfunk

customer_reviews.title: Love this rack.
customer_reviews.text: Very good strong rack. I have lots of coats that I use to hang on one rack that kept falling all the time. So I needed to find something that is strong enough to hold all my coats plus some sweaters. This rack is amazing. It holds all my coats. I am just one happy person. This rack is the best choice if you are looking for a good strong rack to hold many of your heavy coats.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Rios

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a lot of space to use
customer_reviews.text: I have to update my review. I ordered this product 2x, both times they arrived with rust. The second time even worse then before. I contacted the seller and they responded friendly and fast. They have send another rack which was perfect quality. Also the space for the clothes is good. Happy with it. Customer service is perfect and most likely they had a production batch that was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Michel S.

customer_reviews.title: very good rolling rack
customer_reviews.text: We use rolling racks in our warehouse and these are very good. very sturdy and we hang men's suits and sport coats on them and they still work very well. extremely happy we tried these, they are much better than the single bar racks by far...much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and sturdy garment rack
customer_reviews.text: I retracted my previous review that had a couple small issues. The reason being is the fact customer service sent me another one, for which I thought was very generous and showed they care about their customers. The garment rack is very sturdy, I’ve hung quite a bit of my clothes on it and I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: C. Frey

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot of closet organizers and this is the best. I was able to put it together solo
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of closet organizers and this is the best. I was able to put it together solo, but it's super solid. Holds all of my clothing without any bends or bowing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clothes hanger.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, seems very sturdy and reliable to hold heavy clothing while spring cleaning closets. Wish I had purchased two of them. The only negative is each end (4of them) has an extension that you can pull out for more space but does not hold up for heavy hanging articles of clothing w/o bending. SET/Kyle, TX
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy clothing rack
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself (71 yr. old female), Easy to do and a very stable rack.. I even took wooden shelves from an old computer armoire and put them on the bottom to hold shoes and other items. Highly recommend this product and vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria R.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from Simple Housewares brand! It is not Amazon's problem!
customer_reviews.text: This was the second rack I bought after first one had wrong pieces.This time I upgraded, I thought. The new one was almost $20.00 more and just as bad if not worse! One of the poles didn't have a hole to put the connecting pole in. Also, three of the springs that go in the poles were broke, they kept falling out! I will never buy Simple Housewares again!
customer_reviews.author: C. McSweeney

product_meta.title: Simple Houseware Heavy Duty Double Rail Clothing Garment Rack, Chrome
product_meta.description: Size:Double RodSimpleHouseware Supreme Commercial Grade Double Rail Clothing Garment Rack, Chrome
feature_bullets: Commercial Grade - 200 Pound Load Capacity, Collapsible and Easy to Carry
The Unique Double H-shape structure design makes it more sturdy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,775 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
